price: Na Yeye ndiye aliye kuhuisheni kisha akakufisheni, na kisha atakufufueni. Hakika mwanaadamu hana fadhila.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ
footnotes: Na Yeye ndiye aliye kupeni uhai. Kisha anakufisheni unapo malizika muda wenu. Kisha tena atakufufueni Siku ya Kiyama kwa ajili ya hisabu na malipo. Hakika mwanaadamu baada ya neema zote hizi na ushahidi wote huu ni mwingi wa kumkataa Mwenyezi Mungu na kuzikataa neema zake alizo mpa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum inna al-insāna lakafūrun
translations: He will cause you to die
